entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When threads have low free stack space, `StackSpiller` may infinite-loop through the thread pool #61757
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] `RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded` in `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #61756
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Malformed `testResults.xml` causing CI test runs to fail #61749
    7.0.0
  • Possible deadlock in ConfigurationManager in .NET 6 #61747
  • "Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005" crash when starting PowerShell 7.2 on Windows 11 #61740
  • .NET 4.8 - TLS / SCHANNEL / UseStrongCrypto #61739
  • System.MissingMethodException: Method not found: 'Void System.Text.Json.Serialization.Metadata.JsonObjectInfoValues`1.set_ObjectCreator(System.Func`1<!0>)'. with .NET Standard 2.0 #61737
  • Create maui specific runtime branch #61736
    6.0.x
  • JSON serializer code generator produces nullability warnings for constructor arguments #61734
  • crossgen2 asserts: "OwningType == other.OwningType" in MethodWithToken.CompareTo #61732
  • Provide default implementations for older Stream methods in the form of static helper methods #61730
    Future
  • Provide a built-in way to create APM methods from a Task-based method #61729
  • document WaitForExitAsync() Stdout/Stderr drain #61728
  • [API Proposal]: EnumConverter support for numeric/string in but always numeric out #61726
  • [wasm] Some Wasm.Build.Tests+AOT failing on windows #61725
    7.0.0
  • Using EmbeddedFileProvider throws "Operation is not supported on this platform" #61724
  • [wasm][aot] `System.Runtime.Tests` failing on Windows with `RuntimeError: null function or function signature mismatch` #61721
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Figure out a way to detect wasm+windows+aot for tests #61720
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.To Methods #61719
  • Apparent memory leak in .NET versions 5 and 6 when enumerating an IAsyncEnumerable. #61717
  • Buffer Overrun in System.Number.BigInteger #61714
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_Timeout_Loop_Throws(engine: Compiled) #61710
  • Test failure #61709
  • DateTime.ToString("d") cannot be parsed as a DateTime in Arabic #61708
    Future
  • [wasm] Improve native table generation. #61706
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Add ConnectionId to ConnectionBase #41110
    Future
  • .NET6 issue with Encoding.UTF8.GetString vs .NET5, .NET Core 3.1 #61744
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to build IHost when creating EF Migration with Minimal API dotnet 6 #60891
    6.0.x
  • System.Text.Json 6.0.0 package breaks builds with .Net SDK 3.1 #61602
  • Cannot change the ReadOnly file attribute #59406
    Future
  • FileInfo reports wrong attributes on OSX #61409
  • [release/6.0] We should enforce that services packages specify `ServicingVersion` when in a servicing release. #61694
    6.0.x
  • String.Format(formatProvider, "{0:N}", value) regression #61733
  • System.Text.Json: Method not found System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.FindFirstCharacterToEncodeUtf8 happening in Xamarin.Android #56544
    Future
  • suggestion: enable FileStream Length caching on non-Windows #60677
  • [API Proposal]: System.Collections.Generic.SortedList<TKey, TValue> should have SetByIndex(Int32,TValue) #58962
    Future
  • Sockets factories for Connection Abstractions #40044
    Future
  • [MONO][Interp] function call tests failed with SEGV with interpreter #54374
    7.0.0
  • Don't fail superpmi replay job if the only problem is MISSING data #61616
    7.0.0
  • [Perf -16%] System.Collections.CopyTo<String> (6) #37814
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add overloads to `Console.Write` that also take a `ConsoleColor` parameter #61731
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: List<T>.ForEach(Action<T>) -> IEnumerable.ForEach(Action<T>) #61727
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_RandomAccess #60869
    7.0.0
  • My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyFile Bug (It Changes LastWriteTime) #60923
  • SignalR issues due to lack of ISerializable and TimeZoneInfo support #1565
    Future
  • Named Mutex on Different Docker Containers #35968
    Future
  • ConfigurePrimaryHttpMessageHandler is not loading the specified HttpClientHandler in Azure Functions V3 Runtime #36493
    Future
  • system.text.json ignores [JsonConverter(..)] on [FromQuery] in ASP.NET #38939
    Future
  • Optimize the Skip() method for Utf8JsonReader #45200
    Future
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ConstructorTests_Span.ClassWithPrimitives #49634
    7.0.0
  • System.Xml.XmlException: Data at the root level is invalid. Line 1, position 1. #50781
    Future
  • XDocument Fails To Parse XML produced by Interop.Excel (finds non-existent illegal character) #53230
    Future
  • improve Immutable by removing or adding some checks #58977
    Future
  • Very basic findall against list literal is broken. #59358
  • .NET 5.0.5 SortedSet(IComparer).GetViewBetween(X,Y).Max returns invalid value #59640
  • HostedBackground service sometimes freeze #60067
    Future
  • Generate fast-path serialize logic for nullable structs #59719
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix #61560. #61755
    area-System.Buffers
  • Introduce non-shipped System.Runtime.Internal assembly #61754
    area-Infrastructure, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Extract ECAlgorithm from ECDsa and ECDiffieHellman #61753
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Rework startup in test-main.js #61752
    arch-wasm
  • Fix the only ilproj test that uses multiple command-line variants #61750
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update Area Owners for System.Data #61748
    area-Meta
  • [System.Text.Json] Move inline throw statements to `ThrowHelper` #61746
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Actually use TargetOS=AnyOS in the build-test-job. #61745
    area-Infrastructure
  • Convert Crypto P/Invokes to GeneratedDllImport. #61742
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.Data.Odbc, System.IO.Ports, System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController #61741
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Update DNNE version to 1.0.27 #61738
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for dumping and using precise debug info #61735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • prevent concurrent access to IO buffers on macOS #61723
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • Use char override Writer for System.Private.Xml #61722
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm][workload] Try to figure out how to support aot on net6.0 with a net7.0 sdk #61716
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Adding a test covering a really long near epsilon string #61715
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/6.0] disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #61713
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • JIT: support OSR for synchronized methods #61712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests verifying fast-path semantics for nullable structs #61711
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Adding support for the X86Base.Pause intrinsic on Mono #61707
    area-Codegen-meta-mono

Merged

  • src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update docker image #61217
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Skip HardwareIntrinsics/x86base/Pause tests on Mono #61743
  • Merge System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms to System.Security.Cryptography #61543
    area-System.Security
  • HostFactoryResolver - Increase default timeout to thirty seconds #61621
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • A few follow up changes to LookupTypeKey change #61718
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add packaging changes for System.Text.Json #61703
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Factor out and improve the vectorization of RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar #61490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [DllImportGenerator] Enable on projects without System.Memory and System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe #61704
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Remove XUnit reference metadata from tests I switched over last week #61691
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Refactoring CharEntityEncoderFallback for System.Private.Xml #60074
    area-System.Xml
  • Ignore missing data result from superpmi-replay run #61699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some unnecessary slicing from generated Regex code #61701
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Minor File.ReadAllBytes* improvements #61519
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Extend RegexCharClass.Canonicalize range inversion optimization #61562
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][aot] Fix the inclusion of generic instances when doing profile… #61627
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] renames and cleanup before modularization #61596
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable native ports package validation #61697
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • HostFactoryResolver - Increase default timeout and add env var option #61688
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Update SPCL to use GeneratedDllImport where possible. #61640
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • JIT: don't import IL for partial compilation blocks #61572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add [Fact] attributes to all remaining ilproj tests #61625
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` #57418
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Upload dasm files as artifacts for "asmdiffs pipeline" #61700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add single char lazy loop support to simplified Regex code gen #61698
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Add additional binary operations into the RangeCheck analysis. #61662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Don't use recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #61677
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Tie sdb agent lifetime to the ExecutionContext and simplify the api #61392
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow runtimeconfig StartupHooks and Environment StartupHooks to both be present #61461
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Remove race condition from DllImportGenerator build #61695
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update `GetPinnableReference()` usage in multi-step custom type marshalling #61539
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add a new supported signature for pinvokes #61667
    arch-wasm
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • [WIP] Enable stress log on Linux #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] Eval fixes for static class eval #61660
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Create runtime clone to manually kick off full test runs #61641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix handing of native types #61612
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [iOS] Follow up changes for 61590 #61670
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add a JsonWriterOptions.MaxDepth property #61608
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • CreateDirectory: eliminate some syscalls. #58799
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update area-owners to reflect Libraries Area Pod changes #61642
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix perf issues discovered in "For software performance, can you always trust inlining" blog #61408
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix invalid behavior of MoveToAttribute methods #60556
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix issue #60543 #60544
    area-System.Xml
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #61631
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • FileStatus.Unix/Process.Unix: align caching of user identity. #60160
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_DEFER_CLASS_INIT_TO_CTOR #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Fix parsing of ping error replies on raw sockets #61592
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • File.CopyTo: try to pre-allocate disk space for large destination files #61676
    area-System.IO, os-linux, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize SpanHelpers<T>.IndexOf #60974
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • [WIP]: Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make more extensive use of lvaGetDesc() #61494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
